name: Adult Sexual Exploitation
description: Addresses non-consensual sexual touching, sextortion, non-consensual intimate imagery (NCII), creepshots, necrophilia, and forced stripping. Protects victims while allowing discussion of sexual violence.
corePrinciple: We recognize the importance of our services as a place to discuss and draw attention to sexual violence and exploitation. We allow victims to share their experiences but remove content that depicts, threatens, or promotes sexual violence, sexual assault, or sexual exploitation.

nonConsensualSexualTouching.name: Non-Consensual Sexual Touching (NCST)
nonConsensualSexualTouching.definition: Any form of explicit, implicit, or other sexual activity or sexual touching that occurs without consent
lackOfConsentIndicators: Verbal expressions (no, stop) or physical gestures (pushing away, slapping)
Person being touched is unconscious, severely drugged, or intoxicated
Someone saying the sexual activity was unwanted
Someone calling the sexual activity rape or sexual assault

types.name: NCST Imagery
types.exception: Real-world art depicting non-real people with condemning/neutral caption

types.name: NCST Solicitation
types.definition: Statements attempting to share, offer, ask for, or threaten to share NCST imagery

types.name: NCST Narratives
types.definition: Descriptions of NCST with details beyond mere naming/mentioning

contexts.context: Shared by victim/survivor or third party in support/condemnation/awareness/news

types.name: NCST Rape Threats
types.definition: Advocacy, threats, or admission of participation in NCST

potentiallyCredible.requires: Statement of intent OR call to action OR admission + rape + target + ANY ONE OF:

types.name: Identifying Victims of Sexual Assault
types.definition: Content identifying victims by name or image when reported by victim
types.requires: Name match OR face match between reporter and person targeted

types.name: Mocking NCST
types.definition: Content mocking victims/survivors or the concept of NCST

sextortion.name: Sextortion
sextortion.definition: Coercing money, favors, or intimate imagery from people with threats to expose their intimate imagery or intimate information

types.name: Financial-Based Sextortion
types.definition: Threatening to share intimate imagery/information in return for financial gains, cash, or equivalent
examples: Send me $10,000 or I will share your nudes
Send the money through Western Union or I will send your nudes to your family

types.name: Favor-Based Sextortion
types.definition: Threatening to share intimate imagery/information in return for favors
examples: Unblock me or I will share your nudes
Meet me today or I will send your nudes to your family
You better have sex with me if you don't want your sex video on the internet

types.name: Content-Based Sextortion
types.definition: Threatening to share intimate imagery/information in return for additional intimate imagery
examples: Send me a photo of your breasts or I'll post your nudes online
Send me a video of you stripping if you don't want your parents to see your nudes

primaryIndicators: Sexually Engaging Talk to Acquire Intimate Imagery
Threatening or Transactional Talk without clear mention of NCII
secondaryIndicators: DATR contains accounts disabled for Human Exploitation, VAN
FAI Score ≥0.6 for Facebook, ≥0.2 for Instagram

nonConsensualIntimateImagery.name: Non-Consensual Intimate Imagery (NCII)
nonConsensualIntimateImagery.definition: Sharing, threatening, stating intent to share, offering, or asking for intimate imagery without consent

all: Depicts intimate imagery in private setting OR screenshots of private sexual conversations
Lack of consent indicated by signals

lackOfConsentSignals.description: Caption, comments, or page title indicating intent to harm
Face match between reporter and PDITI
Name match between reporter and PDITI

types.name: NCII Harassment
types.definition: NCII shared to humiliate, intimidate, cause distress or embarrassment

types.name: NCII Sensationalist
types.definition: NCII shared for salacious or titillating purposes, including public figures

types.name: NCII Services
types.definition: Services, applications, or instructions to generate non-real NCII (deepfakes, nudification)
types.note: No nude imagery required for violation

privateConversations.definition: Sharing, threatening, or stating intent to share private sexual conversations
lackOfConsentSignals: Face match between reporter and PDITI
Name match between reporter and PDITI

types.name: Creepshots
types.definition: Intimate imagery taken without knowledge of PDITI, shared with intent to mock, sexualize, or reveal identity

takenWithoutKnowledge: PDITI not looking at, posing for, or engaging with camera
Taken through windows, doors, or other openings
Taken from CCTV or hidden camera
Taken from mid-long distance with PDITI facing away
intentSignals: Audio effects or digital alterations drawing attention

types.name: Necrophilia
types.definition: Sexual activity between person(s) and corpse(s)
covers: Statements of intent, calls for action, aspirational/conditional statements
Advocacy, admission of participation, mocking survivors
types.note: Figurative profane expressions (e.g., 'I'll fuck your dead body') treated as targeted cursing under BH

types.name: Forced Stripping
types.definition: Forceful removal of clothing by another person with intent to humiliate or shame
forcedActionIndicators: Resistance from target (throwing hands up, pulling clothes back on)
covers: Advocacy, admission, threats to share imagery
types.note: Forced stripping + NCST = enforce as NCST

intimateImagery.definition: Imagery of one or more people, including manipulated imagery
includes: Imagery focusing on commonly sexualized body parts
Language exposing details of sexual activities
Claims of sexual activity, romantic involvement, sexual orientation, gender identity

privateSetting.definition: Places you would not expect many members of the public to be at any one time
includes: Setting where it's not possible to determine if taken in public
Enclosed setting with one or few people (residential, apartment, car, hotel, bathroom, office, bedroom)
Outdoors but private due to limited people or seclusion

privateConversation.definition: Imagery of private conversation or audio/video recording where names/faces are identifiable and conversation describes sexual arousal or activity

commercialImagery.definition: Imagery produced for commercial media or pornography, typically highly stylized, staged, or professionally edited

indicators: Expression of contempt, disgust, mocking or humiliation
Attacks through derogatory terms related to sexual activity
Attacks based on experiences of sexual assault
Claims about sexual activity, romantic involvement, sexual orientation, gender identity
Comparison to animals/insects perceived as inferior or inanimate objects
Attacks through derogatory terms related to lack of sexual activity
vengefulContext.note: Emojis by themselves do not count

mock.definition: Attempt to make a joke about, laugh at, embarrass, or degrade someone or something
mock.doesNotMean: Attempting to offer counter opinion, refute, or denounce

awareness_raising.definition: Sharing, discussing or reporting new information for improving understanding of issue with public interest value
awareness_raising.requirements: Should not aim to incite violence, spread hate or misinformation

notViolating: Change face apps without nudity/near nudity/sexually suggestive pose
AI friend apps without NCII creation signals
Change cloth/dress apps without NCII creation signals
Design cloth/dress apps without NCII creation signals

violating: AI prompts indicating specific real individual by name or unique characteristics
Uploading photo of any individual with prompts to nudify
notViolating: AI generated nudity/sexual activity not indicating specific real individual

labelHierarchy.label: NCST Identifying Victims of Sexual Assault

potentiallyCredibleRapeThreat.requires: Statement of intent OR call to action OR admission + rape + target + ANY ONE OF:
indicators: Any other form of High Severity Violence
notes: Apply existing VI definitions for location, timing, armament, high severity violence
Since includes admissions, do not consider time limit on post date
Target includes pronouns (you, him, your sister, women, all supporters) or names
Do not escalate if target is clearly fictional character
Do not escalate aspirational or conditional statements (enforce under NCST Rape Threat)

ncstAwareness.definition: NCST-related narrative or news reporting that supports victims/survivors, raises awareness, or condemns NCST
ncstAwareness.note: If NCST imagery present, action under NCST Imagery

realWorldArt.applies: NCST imagery depicting non-real people with condemning or neutral caption

victimSharing.applies: Descriptions shared by victim/survivor or third party in support/condemnation/awareness

bankable: Nudity/Sexual Activity + commercial watermark + known sextortion locale
Nudity/Sexual Activity + private setting + face/name match
Nudity/Sexual Activity + private setting + vengeful captions/text overlay/bios
Deepfakes depicting nudity/sexual activity + private setting + face/name match
doNotBank: Close up nudity without captions or PDITI face
